Maybe disable Freeze Time for a few minutes after casting. As for 
Barbarians, no I'm not going to suggest Doom Boulder or something 
like that.

What Barbarian moves description might look like:

Level 10 Barbarian has:

Hurl Boulder
The barbarian throws a boulder at the enemy, without too much 
accuracy.

Exploding Boulder
Exactly the same as Hurl Boulder, except the boulder explodes when it 
hits something.

War Cry
The barbarian shouts a war cry, demoralising surrounding enemies and 
draining their mana away.

Battlecry
Like War Cry, but also has the opposite effect on surrounding friends.
